article: the last tanks and soldiers withdrew from a battlefield in northern afghanistan as rival warlords met for peace talks to cement a shaky truce that has been threatened by scattered skirmishes .
abstract: all soldiers withdraw from front line after brief skirmishes mar truce in afghanistan
